member.name: T:Chameleon.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Chameleon.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Chameleon.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Chameleon.My.Resources.Resources.Disabled
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to Radius=3
Active Colors=235,236,237|235,236,237 Active Positions=0|1 Active Angle=90 Active Border Color=#c9c9c9 Active Text Color=64,64,64 Active Highlight Color=230,255,255,255.

member.name: P:Chameleon.My.Resources.Resources.Enabled
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to Radius=3
Active Colors=254,254,254|235,236,237 Active Positions=0|1 Active Angle=90 Active Border Color=#c9c9c9 Active Text Color=64,64,64 Active Highlight Color=230,255,255,255
Hover Colors=254,254,255|246,246,247 Hover Positions=0|1 Hover Angle=90 Hover Border Color=#c9c9c9 Hover Text Color=64,64,64 Hover Highlight Color=230,255,255,255
Pressed Colors=186,188,191|212,214,217|212,214,217 Pressed Positions=0|0.2|1 Pressed Angle=90 Pressed Border Color=#c9c9c9 Pressed Text Color=94,95, [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: M:Chameleon.CIELab.#ctor(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Creates an instance of a CIELAB structure.

member.name: M:Chameleon.CIEXYZ.#ctor(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Creates an instance of a CIEXYZ structure.

member.name: M:Chameleon.CMYK.#ctor(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Creates an instance of a CMYK structure.

member.name: T:Chameleon.ColorHelper
member.summary: Provides methods to convert from a color space to an other.

member.name: M:Chameleon.ColorHelper.GetAlphaColor(System.Drawing.Color,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the given color based on a color and an alpha.

member.name: M:Chameleon.ColorHelper.GetBlendColor(System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Color,System.Double)
member.param: Blend ratio. 0.5 will give even blend, 1.0 will return color1, 0.0 will return color2 and so on.

member.name: M:Chameleon.ColorHelper.GetBlendColor(System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Makes an even blend between two colors.

member.name: M:Chameleon.ColorHelper.GetColorDistance(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Gets the "distance" between two colors. RGB colors must be normalized (eg. values in [0.0, 1.0]).

member.name: M:Chameleon.ColorHelper.GetColorDistance(System.Double[],System.Double[])
member.summary: Gets the "distance" between two colors. RGB colors must be normalized (eg. values in [0.0, 1.0]).

member.name: M:Chameleon.ColorHelper.GetWheelColors(System.Int32)
member.param: The alpha value used for each colors.

member.name: M:Chameleon.ColorHelper.GetSpectrumColors(System.Int32)
member.param: The alpha value used for each colors.

member.name: M:Chameleon.ColorHelper.HEXtoColor(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a Hex color to a .net Color.
member.param: The desired hexadecimal color to convert.

member.name: M:Chameleon.ColorHelper.RGBtoHEX(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts a RGB color format to an hexadecimal color.

member.name: M:Chameleon.ColorHelper.ColorToHEX(System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Converts a .Net Color format to an hexadecimal color.

member.name: M:Chameleon.HSB.#ctor(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Creates an instance of a HSB structure.

member.name: M:Chameleon.HSL.#ctor(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Creates an instance of a HSL structure.

member.name: M:Chameleon.RGB.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates an instance of a RGB structure.

member.name: P:Chameleon.pWeatherForecast.pRssClass.pChannelClass.pAstronomyClass.sunrise
member.summary: Today's sunrise time. The time is a string in a local time format of "h:mm am/pm", for example "7:02 am"

member.name: P:Chameleon.pWeatherForecast.pRssClass.pChannelClass.pAstronomyClass.sunset
member.summary: Today's sunset time. The time is a string in a local time format of "h:mm am/pm", for example "4:51 pm"

member.name: P:Chameleon.pWeatherForecast.pRssClass.pChannelClass.pAtmosphereClass.visibility
member.summary: In the units specified by the distance attribute of the units element (mi or km). Note that the visibility is specified as the actual value * 100. For example, a visibility of 16.5 miles will be specified as 1650. A visibility of 14 kilometers will appear as 1400.

member.name: P:Chameleon.pWeatherForecast.pRssClass.pChannelClass.pAtmosphereClass.pressure
member.summary: Barometric pressure, in the units specified by the pressure attribute of the units element (in or mb).

member.name: P:Chameleon.pWeatherForecast.pRssClass.pChannelClass.pAtmosphereClass.rising
member.summary: The State of the barometric pressure, steady = 0, rising = 1, falling = 2

member.name: P:Chameleon.pWeatherForecast.pRssClass.pChannelClass.title
member.summary: The title of the feed, which includes the location city. For example "Yahoo! Weather - Sunnyvale, CA"

member.name: P:Chameleon.pWeatherForecast.pRssClass.pChannelClass.link
member.summary: The URL for the Yahoo! Weather page of the forecast for this location. For example http://us.rd.yahoo.com/dailynews/rss/weather/ Sunnyvale__CA/ *http://xml.weather.yahoo.com/ forecast/94089_f.html

member.name: P:Chameleon.pWeatherForecast.pRssClass.pChannelClass.language
member.summary: The language of the weather forecast, for example, en-us for US English.

member.name: P:Chameleon.pWeatherForecast.pRssClass.pChannelClass.description
member.summary: The overall description of the feed including the location, for example "Yahoo! Weather for Sunnyvale, CA"

member.name: P:Chameleon.pWeatherForecast.pRssClass.pChannelClass.lastBuildDate
member.summary: The last time the feed was updated. The format is in the date format defined by RFC822 Section 5, for example Mon, 256 Sep 17:25:18 -0700.

member.name: P:Chameleon.pWeatherForecast.pRssClass.pChannelClass.ttl
member.summary: Time to Live; how long in minutes this feed should be cached.

member.name: P:Chameleon.pWeatherForecast.pRssClass.pChannelClass.units
member.summary: Units for various aspects of the forecast.

member.name: P:Chameleon.pWeatherForecast.pRssClass.pChannelClass.atmosphere
member.summary: Forecast information about current atmospheric pressure, humidity, and visibility.

member.name: P:Chameleon.pWeatherForecast.pRssClass.pChannelClass.astronomy
member.summary: Forecast information about current astronomical conditions.

member.name: P:Chameleon.pWeatherForecast.pRssClass.pChannelClass.image
member.summary: The image used to identify this feed

member.name: P:Chameleon.pWeatherForecast.pRssClass.pChannelClass.item
member.summary: The local weather conditions and forecast for a specific location.

member.name: P:Chameleon.pWeatherForecast.pRssClass.pChannelClass.pItemClass.pConditionClass.text
member.summary: The textual description of conditions, for example, "Partly Cloudy"

member.name: P:Chameleon.pWeatherForecast.pRssClass.pChannelClass.pItemClass.pConditionClass.code
member.summary: The condition code for this forecast. You could use this code to choose a text description or image for the forecast.

member.name: P:Chameleon.pWeatherForecast.pRssClass.pChannelClass.pItemClass.pConditionClass.temp
member.summary: The current temperature, in the units specified by the units element

member.name: P:Chameleon.pWeatherForecast.pRssClass.pChannelClass.pItemClass.pConditionClass.date
member.summary: The current date and time for which this forecast applies. The date is in RFC822 Section 5 format, for example "Wed, 30 Nov 2005 1:56 pm PST"

member.name: P:Chameleon.pWeatherForecast.pRssClass.pChannelClass.pItemClass.pForecastClass.day
member.summary: The day of the week to which this forecast applies. Possible values are Mon Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Sun

member.name: P:Chameleon.pWeatherForecast.pRssClass.pChannelClass.pItemClass.pForecastClass.date
member.summary: The date to which this forecast applies. The date is in "dd Mmm yyyy" format, for example "30 Nov 2005"

member.name: P:Chameleon.pWeatherForecast.pRssClass.pChannelClass.pItemClass.pForecastClass.low
member.summary: The forecasted low temperature for this day, in the units specified by the units element

member.name: P:Chameleon.pWeatherForecast.pRssClass.pChannelClass.pItemClass.pForecastClass.high
member.summary: The forecasted high temperature for this day, in the units specified by the units element

member.name: P:Chameleon.pWeatherForecast.pRssClass.pChannelClass.pItemClass.pForecastClass.text
member.summary: A textual description of conditions, for example, "Partly Cloudy"

member.name: P:Chameleon.pWeatherForecast.pRssClass.pChannelClass.pItemClass.pForecastClass.code
member.summary: The condition code for this forecast. You could use this code to choose a text description or image for the forecast.

member.name: P:Chameleon.pWeatherForecast.pRssClass.pChannelClass.pItemClass.title
member.summary: The forecast title and time, for example "Conditions for New York, NY at 1:51 pm EST"

member.name: P:Chameleon.pWeatherForecast.pRssClass.pChannelClass.pItemClass.link
member.summary: The Yahoo! Weather URL for this forecast.

member.name: P:Chameleon.pWeatherForecast.pRssClass.pChannelClass.pItemClass.description
member.summary: A simple summary of the current conditions and two-day forecast, in HTML format, including a link to Yahoo! Weather for the full forecast.

member.name: P:Chameleon.pWeatherForecast.pRssClass.pChannelClass.pItemClass.guid
member.summary: Unique identifier for the forecast, made up of the location ID, the date, and the time. The attribute isPermaLink is false.

member.name: P:Chameleon.pWeatherForecast.pRssClass.pChannelClass.pItemClass.pubDate
member.summary: The date and time this forecast was posted, in the date format defined by RFC822 Section 5, for example Mon, 25 Sep 17:25:18 -0700.

member.name: P:Chameleon.pWeatherForecast.pRssClass.pChannelClass.pImageClass.title
member.summary: The title of the image, for example "Yahoo! Weather"

member.name: P:Chameleon.pWeatherForecast.pRssClass.pChannelClass.pImageClass.width
member.summary: The width of the image, in pixels

member.name: P:Chameleon.pWeatherForecast.pRssClass.pChannelClass.pImageClass.height
member.summary: The height of the image, in pixels

member.name: P:Chameleon.pWeatherForecast.pRssClass.pChannelClass.pLocationClass.region
member.summary: The state, territory, or region, if given

member.name: P:Chameleon.pWeatherForecast.pRssClass.pChannelClass.pUnitsClass.temperature
member.summary: Degree units used, f for Fahrenheit or c for Celsius

member.name: P:Chameleon.pWeatherForecast.pRssClass.pChannelClass.pUnitsClass.distance
member.summary: Units for distance, mi for miles or km for kilometers

member.name: P:Chameleon.pWeatherForecast.pRssClass.pChannelClass.pUnitsClass.pressure
member.summary: Units of barometric pressure, in for pounds per square inch or mb for millibars

member.name: P:Chameleon.pWeatherForecast.pRssClass.pChannelClass.pUnitsClass.speed
member.summary: Units of speed, mph for miles per hour or kph for kilometers per hour

member.name: P:Chameleon.pWeatherForecast.pRssClass.pChannelClass.pWindClass.speed
member.summary: wind speed, in the units specified in the speed attribute of the units element (mph or kph).

member.name: M:Chameleon.pWeatherForecast.#ctor(System.String,Chameleon.pWeatherForecast.temperatureUnit)
member.param: The location to get the weather for
Units for temperature. f: Fahrenheit c: Celsius

member.name: M:Chameleon.YUV.#ctor(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Creates an instance of a YUV structure.
